content:
{
  "title": "Patient journey demo",
  "version": "2.4",
  "settings": {
    "pagenumber": 1,
    "editable": true,
    "fullscreenEnabled": false,
    "parameters": {
      "neodash_condition_description": "COVID-19",
      "neodash_condition_description_display": "COVID-19"
    },
    "theme": "light"
  },
  "pages": [
    {
      "title": "Population",
      "reports": [
        {
          "id": "d2602dee-2e67-4f73-844c-c9e7b9cef44c",
          "title": "Population",
          "query": "match (:Patient)\nreturn count(*) as population\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": false,
          "width": 6,
          "height": 2,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 0,
          "type": "value",
          "fields": [],
          "selection": {},
          "settings": {},
          "collapseTimeout": 0,
          "schema": []
        },
        {
          "id": "caa688dd-7807-4ad0-84ff-b9fbd85738f3",
          "title": "Diseased",
          "query": "match (p:Patient)\nwhere p.deathdate is not null\nreturn count(*) as dead\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": false,
          "width": 6,
          "height": 2,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 2,
          "type": "value",
          "fields": [],
          "selection": {},
          "settings": {},
          "collapseTimeout": 0,
          "schema": []
        },
        {
          "id": "e9618e61-6a7e-4876-a73f-575af04b2a29",
          "title": "Gender Distribution",
          "query": "match (p:Patient)\nreturn p.gender as gender, \ncount(*) as population\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": false,
          "width": 6,
          "height": 4,
          "x": 6,
          "y": 0,
          "type": "pie",
          "fields": [
            "gender",
            "population"
          ],
          "selection": {
            "index": "gender",
            "value": "population",
            "key": "(none)"
          },
          "settings": {},
          "collapseTimeout": 0,
          "schema": []
        },
        {
          "id": "24b35acd-589b-469c-b900-67399128999f",
          "title": "Location of Patients",
          "query": "match (p:Patient)\nreturn p limit 250\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": true,
          "width": 12,
          "height": 4,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 4,
          "type": "map",
          "fields": [
            [
              "Patient",
              "address",
              "birthdate",
              "race",
              "ethnicity",
              "gender",
              "last",
              "healthcare_expenses",
              "city",
              "latitude",
              "county",
              "birthplace",
              "healthcare_coverage",
              "location",
              "state",
              "id",
              "drivers",
              "first",
              "longitude",
              "prefix",
              "martial",
              "deathdate"
            ]
          ],
          "selection": {
            "Patient": "(no label)"
          },
          "settings": {
            "defaultNodeSize": "small"
          },
          "collapseTimeout": 0,
          "schema": [
            [
              "Patient",
              "address",
              "birthdate",
              "race",
              "ethnicity",
              "gender",
              "last",
              "healthcare_expenses",
              "city",
              "latitude",
              "county",
              "birthplace",
              "healthcare_coverage",
              "location",
              "state",
              "id",
              "drivers",
              "first",
              "longitude",
              "prefix",
              "martial",
              "deathdate"
            ]
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "title": "Drug prescriptions",
      "reports": [
        {
          "id": "2c913511-aad9-4d0e-a3c5-eb17ba3b2871",
          "title": "Diagnosed Condition followed by Drug Prescription",
          "query": "match path= (c:Condition{description:$neodash_condition_description})<-[:HAS_CONDITION]-(e1)(\n    (f)-[n:NEXT]->(t)\n    where not exists {(f)-[:HAS_DRUG]->(:Drug)}\n    ){1,100}\n(e2)-[:HAS_DRUG]->(d:Drug)\nreturn c,apoc.create.vRelationship(c,'PRESCRIBED',{count:count(*)},d) as rel,d limit 10\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": true,
          "width": 18,
          "height": 5,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 2,
          "type": "sankey",
          "fields": [
            [
              "Condition",
              "code",
              "stop",
              "total_drug_pairings",
              "start",
              "description",
              "isEnd"
            ],
            [
              "Drug",
              "code",
              "basecost",
              "stop",
              "start",
              "description",
              "isEnd",
              "totalcost"
            ]
          ],
          "selection": {
            "Condition": "description",
            "Drug": "description"
          },
          "settings": {
            "labelProperty": "count"
          },
          "collapseTimeout": "auto",
          "schema": []
        },
        {
          "id": "22eacb4f-0b33-49ce-a920-3e6999e5d656",
          "title": "Select Condition",
          "query": "MATCH (n:`Condition`) \nWHERE toLower(toString(n.`description`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) \nRETURN DISTINCT n.`description` as value,  n.`description` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": false,
          "width": 18,
          "height": 2,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 0,
          "type": "select",
          "fields": [],
          "selection": {},
          "settings": {
            "type": "Node Property",
            "entityType": "Condition",
            "propertyType": "description",
            "propertyTypeDisplay": "description",
            "parameterName": "neodash_condition_description"
          },
          "collapseTimeout": 0,
          "schema": []
        },
        {
          "id": "5d259dce-d4b8-444c-8869-6060b682416a",
          "title": "Co-morbidities",
          "query": "match (c1:Condition)<-[:HAS_CONDITION]-(e1:Encounter)-[:NEXT*1..200]->(e2:Encounter)-[:HAS_CONDITION]->(c2:Condition)\nmatch (e1)<-[:HAS_ENCOUNTER]-(patient)\nwhere c1.description = $neodash_condition_description and not c2.description contains \"finding\"\nreturn c1,apoc.create.vRelationship(c1,'PRESCRIBED',{count:count(distinct patient)},c2) as rel,c2 limit 10\n\n\n\n\n",
          "settingsOpen": false,
          "advancedSettingsOpen": true,
          "width": 18,
          "height": 4,
          "x": 0,
          "y": 7,
          "type": "sankey",
          "fields": [
            [
              "Condition",
              "code",
              "stop",
              "total_drug_pairings",
              "start",
              "description",
              "isEnd"
            ]
          ],
          "selection": {
            "Condition": "description"
          },
          "settings": {
            "labelProperty": "count"
          },
          "collapseTimeout": "auto",
          "schema": []
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "parameters": {},
  "extensions": {
    "active": true,
    "activeReducers": [],
    "advanced-charts": {
      "active": true
    },
    "styling": {
      "active": true
    },
    "actions": {
      "active": true
    }
  },
  "uuid": "47c4a3d8-580b-4b8b-b165-53a906331dea"
}
title: Patient journey demo
